TextBody:
Hello,

We are aware of that and are looking into it.
After installing it once the fix is applied.
Applying it more than once will not change anything.
We can have a short remote connection if the customer wants the entry removed.

Kind regards
__________________
Andrei Pop | Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Endpoint Protector
